table.pyName: (select a.sjzdid,a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,a.sjgl from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用')
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='品牌')
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='季节')
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,a.sjgl from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='BOM物料类型')
(SELECT B.SJXMC,B.SJXZ FROM T_SYS_SJZD A, T_SYS_SJZDMX B WHERE A.SJZDID = B.SJZDID AND B.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.STATE = '启用' AND A.SJZDMC = '使用部位' )

table.desc: 往来单位维护（供应商、客户、门店）

往来单位维护-工厂信息
往来单位维护-门店，可多选
销售价格管理-销售调价单维护
以后扩展用，开发人员暂不要调用
全局通用-成品（生产订单、MPS主计划、成品需求计划、成品请购单、成品询价单、成品报价单、成品采购订单、成品到货通知单、成品收料单）
全局通用-材料物资（材料物资品需求计划、材料物资请购单、材料物资询价单、材料物资报价单、材料物资采购订单、采购协议、材料物资到货通知单、材料物资收料单）
MPS主计划，对应页面字段--计划来源
成品需求计划、材料物资需求计划
成品采购订单、材料物资采购订单
成品采购过合同，对应页面-合同模板
材料物资采购过合同，对应页面-合同模板
材料物资入库处理、成品入库处理
成品调整入库单、材料物资调整入库单
成品调整入库单、材料物资调整入库单
借用管理（成品、材料物资）
转储管理（成品、材料物资）
盘点管理（成品、材料物资）
盘点管理（成品、材料物资）

销售出库通知单及销售出库处理

table.pyName: (select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='年份')
(SELECT B.SJZDMXID,B.SJXZ FROM T_SYS_SJZD A ,T_SYS_SJZDMX B WHERE A.SJZDID = B.SJZDID AND B.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.DELFLAG=0 AND B.SJSJZDMXID IS NULL AND A.SJZDMC = '扣款类型')
(SELECT SJSJZDMXID,SJZDMXID,SJXZ FROM T_SYS_SJZDMX WHERE DELFLAG=0 )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='物料性别')
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'RYJB' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'ZW' )
(SELECT CM,WLXXYSID FROM T_ERP_JC_WLZH WHERE DELFLAG=0 )

table.desc: 材料物资入库处理、成品入库处理

table.pyName: (select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'RYLB' )
(select a.keycode,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='季节')

(select a.keycode,a.sjxz,a.sjgl,c.keycode sjkeycode,c.sjxz sjsjxz from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid left join T_SYS_SJZDMX c on c.sjzdmxid = a.sjsjzdmxid where b.sjzdmc='成品款式编码对照' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0 and b.state='启用' and a.sjgl='物料类型' )
(select a.keycode,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='物料性别')
(select a.keycode,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='品牌')
(select a.keycode,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='年份')
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='年份')
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='生产方式')

(select a.keycode,a.sjxz,a.sjgl,c.keycode sjkeycode from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid left join T_SYS_SJZDMX c on c.sjzdmxid = a.sjsjzdmxid where b.sjzdmc='辅料编码对照' and a.sjgl='小类' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0 and b.state='启用')
(select a.keycode,a.sjxz,a.sjgl from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid where a.delflag=0 and b.delflag = 0 and b.state='启用' and b.sjzdmc='材料物资物料类别')
(select a.keycode,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid where b.sjzdmc='面料编码对照' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag = 0 and a.sjgl='工艺' and b.state='启用')
(select a.keycode,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid where b.sjzdmc='面料编码对照' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag = 0 and a.sjgl='大类' and b.state='启用')
(select a.keycode,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid where b.sjzdmc='辅料编码对照' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag = 0 and b.state='启用' and a.sjgl='大类')

(select a.keycode,a.sjxz,a.sjgl,c.keycode sjkeycode from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid left join T_SYS_SJZDMX c on c.sjzdmxid = a.sjsjzdmxid where b.sjzdmc='辅料编码对照' and a.sjgl='中类' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0 and b.state='启用')

table.pyName: (select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,a.sjgl from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid where b.sjzdmc='明细项目' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0 and b.state='启用')
(select XSXMMC from t_erp_cw_interfacexslx)
(select GYSPDMXID,WLDWMC from T_ERP_CG_GYSKPMX where delflag=0 )

table.pyName: (select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc like '%YCXMLB%' and a.sjsjzdmxid is null)

(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'CHANN_BILL_TYPE' )
